title: Eames Style Office Chair EA217 Leather Cream
body: Charles Eames wishes to pursue a perfect office chair. Thus, the Eames Office Chair EA217 was born in 1969. A combination of luxury and functionality, making it the perfect enhancement on your workspace. Eames Office Chair EA217 offers extraordinary comfort and remarkable seating experience. If you are searching for an office chair this one will be the best thing you could invest on. The hand stitched leather covers comfortable foam cushions attached to the seat and backrest will make a long day of work much easier.
